description: This chapter focuses on Ruth's gleaning in the fields, her encounter with Boaz, a wealthy kinsman of Elimelech, his kindness toward her, and Naomi's revelation that Boaz is one of their near kinsmen and redeemers.

questions.question: What kind of man was Boaz, who was a kinsman of Naomi's husband?
Of which family was Boaz?
What did Ruth the Moabitess ask Naomi?
options: Let me go to the market
Let me now go to the field, and glean ears of corn after him in whose sight I shall find grace
Let me go to the temple
Let me go to the city

questions.question: How did Naomi respond to Ruth's request?
What did Ruth do in the field?
options: She gleaned in the field after the reapers

questions.question: To whom did the field belong where Ruth happened to glean?
options: Unto Boaz, who was of the kindred of Elimelech

questions.question: From where did Boaz come?
What greeting did Boaz give to the reapers?
How did the reapers respond to Boaz?
To whom did Boaz address his question about Ruth?
options: His servant that was set over the reapers

questions.question: How did the servant describe Ruth?
options: It is the Moabitish damsel that came back with Naomi out of the country of Moab
I don't know who she is

questions.question: How long had Ruth been working in the field according to the servant?
options: Even from the morning until now

questions.question: Where had Ruth tarried a little according to the servant?
How did Boaz address Ruth?
With whom did Boaz tell Ruth to stay?
options: Abide here fast by my maidens

questions.question: What did Boaz tell Ruth to do when she was thirsty?
options: Go unto the vessels, and drink of that which the young men have drawn

questions.question: How did Ruth respond to Boaz's kindness?
options: She fell on her face, and bowed herself to the ground

questions.question: How did Ruth describe herself to Boaz?
To whom did Boaz say Ruth had shown kindness after her husband's death?
What did Boaz say Ruth had left behind?
options: Thy father and thy mother, and the land of thy nativity

questions.question: Who did Boaz say would recompense Ruth's work?
Under whose wings did Boaz say Ruth had come to trust?
How did Ruth address Boaz?
What food did Boaz tell Ruth to eat at mealtime?
In what did Boaz tell Ruth to dip her morsel?
What kind of grain did Boaz give to Ruth?
Where did Boaz tell his young men to let Ruth glean?
options: At the edge of the field

questions.question: What did Boaz command his men to do for Ruth?
options: Let fall also some of the handfuls of purpose for her

questions.question: Until when did Ruth glean in the field?
How much barley did Ruth gather after beating out what she had gleaned?
options: About half an ephah of barley

questions.question: Besides what she had gleaned, what else did Ruth bring to Naomi?
options: She brought forth, and gave to her that she had reserved after she was sufficed

questions.question: What questions did Naomi ask Ruth?
options: Where hast thou gleaned to day? and where wroughtest thou?
How much wages did you get?

questions.question: What did Naomi say about the one who took knowledge of Ruth?
options: Blessed be he that did take knowledge of thee

questions.question: What was the name of the man Ruth worked with that day?
options: The man's name with whom I wrought to day is Boaz

questions.question: To whom did Naomi say Boaz showed kindness?
options: To the living and to the dead
To the poor and to the rich
To children and to the elderly

questions.question: How did Naomi describe Boaz's relationship to them?
options: The man is near of kin unto us, one of our next kinsmen

questions.question: According to Ruth, until when did Boaz tell her to stay with his young men?
options: Until they have ended all my harvest

questions.question: Why did Naomi advise Ruth to go out with Boaz's maidens?
options: That they meet thee not in any other field
That they speak not to thee

questions.question: Until the end of which harvests did Ruth keep fast by Boaz's maidens?
options: Barley harvest and of wheat harvest

questions.question: Where did Ruth dwell during the harvest time?
What did the servant say Ruth requested to do among the sheaves?
options: Let me glean and gather after the reapers among the sheaves

questions.question: What did Boaz say he had charged the young men not to do to Ruth?
options: That they shall not speak to thee
That they shall not touch thee
That they shall not look at thee
That they shall not mock thee
